intro.header: <0>First thing's first</0>. Here is the quick overview of our onboarding process that consists of <0>two steps</0>.

step1.content: Create your business profile to boost your digital presence. Add your business information, menu offering, photo gallery, delivery partners, among others.

step2.content: Follow our product tour to set up your business operations and manage it all from a single platform.

step1.title: Create Your Business Profile
step1.subtitle: This is an example of a business profile once onboarding is completed.

service.content: We strongly recommend you <0>add service redirections links</0> to your own website & your partner platforms.

step1.swipe: Swipe the phone up and down to see the full profile
